concept.title: Smith-Corona Typewriter Cases and Care Considerations
concept.shortdesc: Protective storage cases for Smith-Corona typewriters have specific care needs to be considered.

section.title: Smith-Corona Holiday Case
section.p: Portable Smith-Corona machines are commonly stored in a case known as the “Holiday Case.” This case is slightly larger than standard typewriter carriers and can be disassembled. Holiday Cases are made of a non-porous material that resists staining, allowing most marks to be removed with mild soap and water.

section.title: Alternate Case Styles
section.p: Some machines may be found in different styles of cases. The care process for these cases varies based on their materials and construction.
Cases made of other materials may have hinges that need to be unscrewed for removal rather than unhooked. The cleaning solution required may differ depending on the case's material.

section.note: For leather, cloth, or carpet-style cases, the cleaning solution should be selected carefully. Research and patch test all detergents and cleaners before use to prevent damage or discoloration.
